__e: That's all we needed to know.
Well, I guess you told me what we wanted to know.
That tells us what we want to know, Hall.
With the decoration, we wanted it to be as if they were in their own house, with furniture in noble materials, without skimping to make your stay as pleasant as possible.
We wanted you to be the first to know.
We wanted to give people their money's worth with our records
We only wanted you to dine with us.

How is everyone enjoying your summer vacation? We have a surprise for you guys coming this fall and we just wanted to give you a little hint. Any guesses as to which game we will be releasing soon ^^ ?
Brother Le Croix, we just wanted to see him in person.
You told me he'd had an accident. What? What are you playing at, Felder?

You know, the reason that we're here, basically... is that we've talked to certain people who... have indicated that the reason you left the Committee... was because you no longer want to be part of it.
We took the time to carefully choose these ten small works because we wanted to offer you a beautiful collection.
We didn't want others, and so they were not.
Don't think that since you don't see his mother here, that we didn't want this little child who was our first.
We didn't want to disturb you but the door was open! Right Inspector?
We're always gonna get married, it wasn't in the cards.
